description: Detects WMI SquiblyTwo Attack with possible renamed WMI by looking for imphash Author: Markus Neis / Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: SquiblyTwo
query: (process.command_line:*http* AND ((process.executable:*\\wmic.exe AND process.command_line:*wmic* AND process.command_line:*format*) OR (winlog.event_data.Imphash:("1B1A3F43BF37B5BFE60751F2EE2F326E" OR "37777A96245A3C74EB217308F3546F4C" OR "9D87C9D67CE724033C0B40CC4CA1B206") AND process.command_line:*format\:*)))
